products.title: Crushed Velvet Steel & Mineral Trimmed Roman Blind
products.description: Your home needs to look stylish and reflect your personality too. That's why this crushed velvet roman blind is perfect; its got that sleek style that you need with a little fun thrown in for good measure. ? The crushed velvet finish is incredibly on trend and the grey tones wil your home needs to look stylish and reflect your personality too.

products.title: Quintessence Paloma & Stone Trimmed Roman Blind
products.description: Weve added even more charm to this delightful quintessence paloma roman blind fabric with the addition of a neutral decorative trim of dangling tassels. ? This cosy, textured fabric will fit in with most design schemes, the tactile finish and neutral tones giving it a homely fe weve added even more charm to this delightful quintessence paloma roman blind fabric with the addition of a neutral decorative trim of dangling tassels.

products.title: Orla Silver Roman Blind
products.description: This orla silver roman blind is beautifully textured. That texture then gives it an interesting finish that lifts it above your plain fabrics and offers an added layer of sophistication. The shimmering threads will catch the light to give it some low level sparkle. You can pair t this orla silver roman blind is beautifully textured.

products.title: Louella Charcoal Roman Blind
products.description: This beautiful floral trail design from harlequin looks equally as stylish in classic and contemporary homes alike. The louella charcoal roman blind features stunning abstract flowers and leaves, and is the perfect choice to create sophisticated sitting rooms and beautiful bedr this beautiful floral trail design from harlequin looks equally as stylish in classic and contemporary homes alike.

products.title: Baroc Silver Roman Blind
products.description: A stylish statement thats perfect for all tastes, the baroc silver roman blind from the harlequin additions collection is an exquisite design, full of charm. The refreshing hue is the perfect choice for modern homes, with the neutral tone, subtle pattern and textured finish a stylish statement thats perfect for all tastes, the baroc silver roman blind from the harlequin additions collection is an exquisite design, full of charm.

products.title: Kinabalu Silver Roman Blind
products.description: A majestic elephant and their offspring are marching across a canvass of exotic foliage in this beautiful harlequin design. Picked out in a gorgeous neutral colourway, the detail is simply incredible. With plenty of rustic charm too, this contemporary roman blind is somethin a majestic elephant and their offspring are marching across a canvass of exotic foliage in this beautiful harlequin design.

products.title: Watercolour Stripe Pebble Roman Blind
products.description: This earthy palette is perfect for adding some pattern to your home. A perfectly useable piece, this clarissa hulse roman blind design was originally hand painted by clarissa herself to create stunning watercolour stripes across the fabric. The warm neutrals of grey and stone com this earthy palette is perfect for adding some pattern to your home.

products.title: Trellis Steel Roman Blind
products.description: Simple greys and simple whites in a simple trellis pattern - its the perfect way to add pattern to your home in the most elegant way imaginable. We all know how good grey is as a neutral tone, it will sit comfortably everywhere an added bonus if you like to change your decor simple greys and simple whites in a simple trellis pattern - its the perfect way to add pattern to your home in the most elegant way imaginable.

products.title: Knightsbridge, Taupe - Roman Blind
products.description: Fresh and linen-like in a neutral country beige, the knightsbridge taupe is a versatile and accommodating blind, well suited to a number of different decor styles and colour schemes. As always, the roman style adds softness and curves that complement the utilitarian shade of this blind perfectly. The taupe will work wonderfully as a tempering neutral tone for a deep hunter's green. Amalgamate greens, beiges, and country checks for a serious and studious feel in a classically styled home office, with a rustic rural twist.

products.title: Hedgerow, Charcoal - Roman Blind
products.description: In the hedgerow charcoal, current florals, in taupes, mustards, greys, and blacks, sit on a soft, creamy beige background. The linen-look cloth hangs neatly into the flowing shape of the roman, giving a classical edge to this modern blind. Go for contemporary cosiness in the living room by placing the charcoal amongst similarly coloured accents. Pick just one or two shades from the blind, perhaps mustard yellow and mushroom grey, and scatter them, in the form of lamps, cushions, and oddments, throughout the room.

products.title: Ahisma Luxe Faux Silk Silver Roman Blind
products.description: Such a popular colour for silk blinds, this blind is a gorgeous silver in tone with undercurrents of warm grey. This blind will be the perfect companion to any stylish setting from the living room right through to the bedroom and dining room. The ahisma luxe faux silk silver bl such a popular colour for silk blinds, this blind is a gorgeous silver in tone with undercurrents of warm grey.

products.title: Ahisma Luxe Faux Silk Slate Roman Blind
products.description: This ahisma luxe faux silk slate roman blind has such a luxurious look, the fabric, complete with natural looking slubs, suits the rich metallic tone beautifully. To create an opulent room just add precious metal finishes. With the sunlight streaming through the blind and refle this ahisma luxe faux silk slate roman blind has such a luxurious look, the fabric, complete with natural looking slubs, suits the rich metallic tone beautifully.

products.title: Ahisma Luxe Faux Silk Warm Grey Roman Blind
products.description: Here, this ahisma luxe faux silk roman blind is a fabulous and glamorous shade of subtle lilac, perfect for adding a wash of soft colour at the window. This roman blind has all the look of silk including a subtle lustre and wonderful slub detail. Of course its totally practi here, this ahisma luxe faux silk roman blind is a fabulous and glamorous shade of subtle lilac, perfect for adding a wash of soft colour at the window.

products.title: Rosso Softshade Rock Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: The rosso softshade clay rock grey is presented in a stone grey hue that will coordinate well with a natural inspired colour palette. This blind with its horizontal striped design and voile panels is an elegant way to control the incoming light within your space and achieve level of privacy you desire.
